channel.title: Helppp
channel.description:
ALRIGHT IM NOOBI KNOW... ummm listen. I wanna make my mage arena and only my mage arena a safe zone. Its kind of weird that i dont know how to do it but all i know is that i found this :
[code]public boolean inSafezone() { // ... if ((absY >= 2529 && absY <= 4723 && absX <= 2546 && absX >= 4711)) return true; else return false;[/code] which i really know that this would help me... But im asking someone to post what i have to do to get my mage arena fully safe zoned. PLease help!!! thanxxx

item.description:
@redfrodude27 wrote:

absX >= ----

Is the bottom X

&& absX <= ----

Is the top right X

&& absY >= ----

Is the bottom right Y

 && absY <= ----)

Is the top right Y
